name: Rohin Qaderyan
role: Senior Full Stack Developer & Data Scientist
bio: Experienced Veteran and Full Stack Software Developer driven by a passion for innovation in business solutions. Proficient in React, Angular, Python, and cloud technologies, with expertise in AI-driven data solutions and delivering exceptional user experiences.
tagline: Building innovative solutions through cutting-edge technology

seo.title: Rohin Qaderyan - Senior Full Stack Developer & Data Scientist
seo.description: Portfolio of Rohin Qaderyan, Senior Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist specializing in React, Angular, Python, AWS, Azure, and AI-driven solutions at Pfizer.

about.headline: Innovating at the intersection of development and data science
paragraphs: As an experienced Veteran and Senior Full Stack Developer, I bring a unique perspective to technologyâ€”combining disciplined military training with cutting-edge development expertise. My journey spans from serving as a Cryptologic Linguist in the U.S. Army to leading enterprise AI solutions at Pfizer.

I specialize in building scalable applications using React, Angular, Python, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure. At Pfizer, I design data-driven AI solutions using Snowflake and DSS Dataiku, streamlining workflows by 15% and improving data quality by 25%. My experience spans from enterprise healthcare to startup fintech, always focused on delivering practical, innovative solutions.

Beyond code, I'm passionate about bridging cultural and technical divides. Fluent in multiple languages (Persian, Pashto, French, Hindi, Urdu) and experienced in international collaboration, I bring a global perspective to problem-solving. I'm committed to continuous learning and making a lasting impact through forward-thinking technology.
highlights: Streamlined data science workflows by 15% at Pfizer
Cut software release time by 50% with CI/CD
U.S. Army Veteran with 6+ years of service
